channel.title: Delete all and add all?
channel.description:
im looking at a code similar to filling a vial in a sink it deletes one vial and adds a vial of water how can i change this code to delete all carried vials and add the same number of water filled vials?
here is my delete item and add item codes [code=java] player.getInventory().deleteItem(229, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(227, 3);[/code]
source: matrix? 667/711

item.title: Delete all and add all?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well you could do something like

while (player.hasItem(emptyVial)) {
    player.getInventory().remove(emptyVial, 1);
    player.getInventory().add(filledVial, 1);
}

Read full topic

item.description:

that would make botting so much easierâ€¦ i dont recommend it
